short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate specific Korean terms to English on https://cho.elphago.work/en with a toggle switch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This switch will translate Korean text to English on chopago-transcendance capture tool, happy gaming folks!
